result.longName: Shanghai Rural Commercial Bank Co., Ltd.

assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Shanghai Rural Commercial Bank Co., Ltd. provides a range of banking products and services to individual and corporate customers in China. The company offers deposits, including current, term, call, and fixed deposits, as well as certificates of deposit and agreement deposits; and housing, consumer, business, farmer, and entrusted loans. It provides credit and debit cards; wealth management services; insurance and treasure bond brokerage services; open-ended funds; settlement, financial advisory, and treasury services; electronic and telephone banking services; safe keeping boxes; and SME finance services. The company also offers supply chain, working capital, fixed assets, fixed assets support, and agriculture finance products; investment banking credit, credit line, guarantee, and non-financial institution financing products; and commercial bill acceptance and discount, forfeiting, foreign exchange, and domestic settlement services, as well as ATMs. In addition, it provides export and import financing, letter of guarantee and credit, inward and outward remittance, and documentary collection services; and engages in the gold and metal, and bank securities transfer businesses. Shanghai Rural Commercial Bank Co., Ltd. was formerly known as Shanghai Rural Credit Co-operatives Union and changed its name to Shanghai Rural Commercial Bank Co., Ltd. in August 2005. The company was incorporated in 2005 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
